Module gmit.software
Package ie.gmit.sw.sprites.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.sprites.entities.Entity
      • ie.gmit.sw.sprites.entities.Human
        • ie.gmit.sw.sprites.entities.Player

  • public class Player
extends Human
    Returns animated player character. Controls position of a player using arrow key form keyboard input. Takes image for animation from assets class. Sets boundary for player collision with other entity
    Author:
    Kamilka
